Reviews.Title: Cheap Keyboard
Reviews.Author: S. Gayadeen
Reviews.Content: The laptop works great and it has good specs for the price but it's very cheaply made..I can live with the cheap feel of it, but my problem is really the keyboard. I am not a large person and my fingers are of moderate size, but this keyboard (I'm not speaking of the keys here obviously) actually sinks into the laptop when you type anywhere in the left region. I would actually return it if I did not live in the Caribbean, it's way too costly to ship back from here..

Reviews.Title: Lenovo G500s 59380376 15.6" Laptop i5 8GB 1TB
Reviews.Author: C. I. Sherwood
Reviews.Content: Bang for the buck. It may not be a Mac, but who wants one, when you can get all this built into a sleek and fast machine. Great graphics, quiet to run, loads of ports. Love it.

Reviews.Title: Incredible Laptop/Best Value Laptop
Reviews.Author: Computer Expert
Reviews.Content: This laptop has some incredible specs for its price, and I am really impressed with its power and look. I bought it in the spring and I am kicking myself for not waiting to get it at these prices. This will last me for at least 2 years before I upgrage, and I usually upgrade every year because I do all my work on my computer. The style is very clean and sleek. The huge hard drive is fast and efficient. The i7 processor and powerful graphics card let me run more applications and keep more browser windows open than I ever need. Also my kids play high-end games on it and play it all the time. For $550 this one is a STEAL and IO recommend it to everyone who wants a high end laptop for mid-range prices! Even with Black Friday coming up.

Reviews.Title: Lenovo G500, great machine
Reviews.Author: Medinah
Reviews.Content: This is capable laptop,  fast, clean easy to set up,  and for me,  I was glad it was not cluttered with a bunch of "freeware"This is my second G500 I have purchased ,  the first one was for my daughter,  she loved it.  After that experience I felt confided  i  buying another for my son

Reviews.Title: comp review
Reviews.Author: melinda
Reviews.Content: Love this computer, I wasn't sure if I would like it, a few people at my husbands work have them, but I really love it!!

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: mariano
Reviews.Content: hell yea  good  computer is  just  i  need i really ejoy is  very  fast  and the  wifi  is  awesome thanks

Reviews.Title: Awsome machine Great service
Reviews.Author: bbqmstr
Reviews.Content: I ordered this computer and expected it to take 6 or 7 days to come in. It arrived is 3 days (including the weekend) and I really like this machine.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop
Reviews.Author: Joe Bosque "Joe"
Reviews.Content: I got this for my youngest boy and he loves it , a great starting laptop , it works perfectly , all the features works great on this laptop me and wife likes this at times for its reliability . .

Reviews.Title: A great machine
Reviews.Author: Sumeet Raval
Reviews.Content: A great machine. Really fast, good quality......glad we bought it. Good value for money. Looked at other laptops out there and this was really well priced for its features. Delivery was prompt. arrived in 4 days

Reviews.Title: Value for money!!
Reviews.Author: Ajay Singh
Reviews.Content: I came across this product first on Amazon as Lenovo didn't have this product info on their site. It's totally worth the money!!!

Reviews.Title: LENOVO, BANG FOR YOUR BUCK!
Reviews.Author: Symmetrical J
Reviews.Content: This laptop is perfect for the price, it's a lot better than laptops i have bought in the past, cheaper too, lenovo is a great laptop manufacturer.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful machine with high value for price; wireless problem
Reviews.Author: Nic Bukharin
Reviews.Content: 4 out of 5 stars because (like others have experienced) wireless doesn't work.  I'm in the process of uninstalling wireless drivers and re-installing to fix the problem, as per the advice of Lenovo forum.Otherwise, excellent value for money.  Strong specs.

Reviews.Title: A working laptop for the working class's budget.
Reviews.Author: Giuseppe
Reviews.Content: This computer seems fast enough to handle my basic programs such as Solidworks and Altium. Feels sturdy and slim. Battery life is okay but hey, unless you get an extended battery, this is always the case. Multi touch pad is nice, screen is the right size, and it runs quiet. If you want or want to get someone a no bull-$h1T computer, get this one. Though, I would put Windows 7 on it. I was too lazy to do this since I already installed many programs.

Reviews.Title: its terrible
Reviews.Author: TW
Reviews.Content: bought in december, already having a login issue and lenovo just wants to charge me to fix the problem.  haven't even used it much.  suggest others look at another laptop besides lenovo.

Reviews.Title: Good laptop for the money
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: Good processor, does everything like it should. I5 chip dies the job, I will recomend this to anyone, great bang for the buck.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Wendy W
Reviews.Content: I received my Lenovo G500 on 01/14/14 and on 02/09/14 it completely crashed.  The company I purchased it through on here says they only cover the situation if it happens within 7 days of receipt.  So I have to pay to send it back to Lenovo for repairs.  I paid $570.00 for it originally and less than a month later I have to pay more money to send it back.  Lenovo states that they will repair it and set it back to factory settings and pay to ship it back to me....but now I have lost material that was entered, loss of time needed to work on it, and money out-of-pocket....Just not a happy camper at this time.  :(

Reviews.Title: Lenovo laptop
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: The original description was for a touch screen, my main reason for purchasing it however when I received it, it was not a touchscreen.  All the paperwork with the computer was for a touch screen.  The computer itself is a great buy and I like it...just wish it would've been a touch

Reviews.Title: Satisfied with my Lenovo
Reviews.Author: Franco
Reviews.Content: The computer its fast enough to do college stuff. Sometimes the W8 is a little bit miss leading.  The computer arrived sooner than expected. Price considerable. As it cost me 577+shipping.  Good performance and this modele is unique, meaning that if you go in to the lenovo web page, you will not find anything like it.

Reviews.Title: Brother loves it
Reviews.Author: M. Straus
Reviews.Content: This was for my brother who does light gaming I guess, like Civilization, League of Legends. He didn't have that much money to spend and the specs on this seemed great for the price. He loves it, in terms of processor speed and when he's playing, he says the wait times are comparable if not better than his older brothers HP (which cost more). He said some of the software was kind of, well not typical namebrand so like instead of Windows Media Player it was Lenovo Media Player. But that didn't bother him at all, it would be a fairly easy fix to download Itunes or whatever and be done. He is really happy with it.The laptop isn't smooth, it's kind of ridged but I actually liked the feel of it. Just forewarning.Edit: less than 4 months since purchase and computer starting having major issues. A computer tech informed me that the hard drive had crashed, I'm still waiting to see what Lenovo will cover with warranty.

Reviews.Title: Very disipointing
Reviews.Author: Brian Case
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my wife, it was loaded with the typical, (not full version of windows) and tons of Lenovo related junk malware / spyware. It crashes all the time giving  Blue screen of death. I will try formatting it and putting a full real version of windows on it and see if that helps, but you shouldn't have to do this. What if I wasn't computer savvy? This was a Christmas gift to my wife, and its a real bummer I gave her garbage!!!This is the first and last Lenovo I will ever buy!!

Reviews.Title: Worth for money , Less on Quality
Reviews.Author: Muthamilselvan Nambiraja
Reviews.Content: I really happy with this product since it has more features for less money... I am not really happy with the quality of this product esp. key pad... The Key pad design and key's quality is not good...  The dust is easily going inside the keypad.. On the whole its not a 3rd generation design... Try to improve the design of this model...

Reviews.Title: Don't fall for the "value for your money" line...
Reviews.Author: michael Dell
Reviews.Content: Absolutely terrible speakers, the worst squirrely touchpad have ever encountered , hard edged & uncompfortable to use &  just  loaded with bloatware, complete Chinese junk and it screams cheap....(pay a little more, just buy anything but Lenovo trust me )

Reviews.Title: Lenovo review
Reviews.Author: Foster K Palmer
Reviews.Content: The computer seems fine, but the software especially windows 8 is a pain. Some days it will not let me log out of email accounts, and sometimes it keeps my emails open 24/7 and there does not seem to be a way to shut it down.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel i5-3230M 2.60GHz 3MB Cache Processor (3.20GHz Turbo Boost)
8GB DDR3 SDRAM Installed Memory
1TB 5400RPM Hard Drive
15.6" LED HD widescreen display (1366x768)
Windows 8 (64-bit)
ProductInfo.Name: Lenovo G500s 59380376 15.6 inch Laptop (Intel i5-3230M 2.6GHZ Processor, 8 GB RAM, 1TB Hard drive, Windows 8 64-bit)
